name: @bidnessforb/postman-sdk
description: Barebones SDK for the Postman API
author: Bryan Cross

scripts.docs:build: documentation build src/collections/collection.js src/requests/request.js src/responses/response.js src/workspaces/workspace.js src/specs/spec.js src/environments/environment.js src/tags/tag.js src/users/user.js src/mocks/mock.js src/monitors/monitor.js src/groups/group.js src/pullRequests/pullRequest.js src/forks/fork.js src/transformations/transformation.js -f html -o docs/api
scripts.docs:md: documentation build src/collections/collection.js src/requests/request.js src/responses/response.js src/workspaces/workspace.js src/specs/spec.js src/environments/environment.js src/tags/tag.js src/users/user.js src/mocks/mock.js src/monitors/monitor.js src/groups/group.js src/pullRequests/pullRequest.js src/forks/fork.js src/transformations/transformation.js -f md -o docs/API-REFERENCE.md && node scripts/format-api-docs.js
scripts.docs:serve: documentation serve src/collections/collection.js src/requests/request.js src/responses/response.js src/workspaces/workspace.js src/specs/spec.js src/environments/environment.js src/tags/tag.js src/users/user.js src/mocks/mock.js src/monitors/monitor.js src/groups/group.js src/pullRequests/pullRequest.js src/forks/fork.js src/transformations/transformation.js -w
